mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At TopalX Driving School, we are dedicated to training responsible and confident drivers who actively contribute to road safety. We offer personalized, high-quality driving courses using modern teaching methods and updated vehicles to ensure complete and effective training. However, you don’t have to just take our word for it. Our pride comes from the reviews and success stories of our students who have not only obtained their driving licenses but also enjoyed a learning experience tailored to their needs. We invite you to visit the testimonials section on our website to discover authentic accounts that highlight the quality of our services and their positive impact on the driving community.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: Our team consists of experienced professionals passionate about driving education. Meet the people who make it all possible.

companyDescription.title: About Us
companyDescription.paragraph1: Founded by a driving instructor with over 25 years of experience, TopalX is the result of a shared passion with his wife for quality driving education. The school's name comes from the family name, bringing with it a tradition and dedication to road safety and education. The founder's dedication, stemming from decades of experience in driver training, is deeply embedded in every aspect of the courses offered.
companyDescription.paragraph2: The goal of TopalX is not only to prepare students to pass the driving test but also to cultivate responsibility and deep respect for traffic rules. Each training program is meticulously planned to ensure that every student understands not only the mechanics of driving but also the importance of preventive behavior on public roads. By using teaching methods tailored to the individual needs of students and employing a modern vehicle fleet equipped to high standards, the school ensures that every new driver is fully prepared to navigate various traffic situations safely and confidently.
companyDescription.paragraph3: Additionally, TopalX places great emphasis on developing ethical behavior behind the wheel, promoting values of respect and caution essential for harmonious coexistence in traffic. With a team of passionate and dedicated instructors from various branches of the automotive field, the school guarantees a complete and deeply human learning experience aimed at developing responsible drivers who are aware of their impact on the community.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how TopalX Driving School collects, uses, and protects your personal data when you use our website and services.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how TopalX - Driving School collects, uses, and protects your personal data when you use our website and services.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the following personal data through the contact form:

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Data Collection
purpose.content: We use this data to respond to your inquiries and to provide you with information about our services.

storage.title: 4. Data Storage and Protection
storage.content: Your data is stored securely and will not be shared with third parties without your consent. The data is kept for the necessary period for the purposes for which it was collected, after which it will be deleted.

rights.title: 5. User Rights
rights.content: According to GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: Right of access: You can request access to your personal data that we hold.
Right to rectification: You can request the correction of your personal data if it is inaccurate.
Right to erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal data.
Right to restrict processing: You can request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.
Right to data portability: You can request the transfer of your personal data to another controller.
Right to object: You can object to the processing of your personal data.

I also agree that the AGENT may use and/or process my personal data for their own purpose, including offering and/or selling products/services, until I expressly withdraw my given consent, and they are prohibited from trying to obtain my consent for the purpose of processing my data for marketing purposes. I have been informed that this data will be treated confidentially, in accordance with the provisions of EU Regulation No. 679/2016 regarding the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and the protection of privacy in the electronic communications sector.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.intro: These terms and conditions govern the use of the website and the services offered by TopalX Driving School. By using this site, you fully accept these terms and conditions.

services.title: 1. Services Offered
services.content: TopalX Driving School offers theoretical and practical courses for obtaining a category B driver's license. All services are offered in accordance with the applicable legal regulations. The school ensures the organization of practical and theoretical courses at an adequate level, aiming for the student to acquire the necessary knowledge to obtain a category B driver's license.

registration.title: 2. Registration
registration.content: To register for our courses, you must complete the registration form available on the site or contact us by phone and provide accurate and complete information. Training will begin only after submitting the registration form, a copy of your identity document, and the original criminal record with the mention for the driving exam.

payments.title: 3. Payments
payments.content: Course payments are made according to the information provided on the website. All payments are non-refundable, except in cases where the courses are canceled by the school. For any questions or clarifications, please contact the secretariat. The contract value is payable in full or in 3 installments, according to the training contract.

cancellation.title: 4. Cancellations
cancellation.content: If you wish to cancel your participation in the courses, you must notify us in writing at least 7 days before the course start date. Cancellations made after this deadline will not be refunded.

privacy.title: 5. Privacy
privacy.content: The personal data collected through this site will be used exclusively for processing registrations and communicating with students. The data will be shared with third parties only with your consent or in accordance with legal requirements. The data is sent to ARR (Romanian Road Authority) for session reporting.

liability.title: 6. Liability
liability.content: TopalX Driving School does not assume responsibility for any accidents or damages that occur during practical courses, except in cases of negligence by the instructors.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications to the Terms and Conditions
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page and will take effect immediately.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For any questions or concerns regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at:

items.question: What are the steps to enroll in the driving school?
items.answer: To enroll you only need your ID card/residence permit and a minimum advance payment of 700 lei. Later, you must bring the criminal record with the mention for the driving exam.

items.question: What documents are needed for enrollment?
items.answer: For enrollment you only need your ID card.

items.question: How long do the theoretical and practical courses last?
items.answer: The theoretical courses last 7 days. The practical courses last a minimum of 5 weeks and a maximum of 6 months.

items.question: What types of cars are available for driving lessons?
items.answer: We offer a wide range of modern and well-maintained cars with manual or automatic transmission, depending on preferences.

items.question: What are the fees for driving courses?
items.answer: The fees vary depending on the type of course chosen. For more details, please visit the services section on our website.

items.question: How can I schedule driving lessons?
items.answer: Driving lessons are scheduled at the secretariat according to the student's schedule and the availability of the instructor.

items.question: What happens if I don't pass the exam?
items.answer: If you do not pass the theoretical exam, you may retake it after a 16-day period. Should you not pass the practical exam, you will be required to attend 3 mandatory additional sessions, after which you will receive a certificate that allows you to reschedule the driving test.

items.question: Are there any discounts for students or groups?
items.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for students and groups. Contact us for more details about our current offers.

tips: Read the driving manual carefully and understand the basics.
Practice defensive driving to stay safe.
Take it slow and steady while learning to park.
Always check your mirrors before changing lanes.
Understand road signs and markings clearly.
Use your turn signals early to let others know your intentions.
Maintain a safe following distance, especially in poor weather.
Learn how to handle emergency situations (e.g., skidding or tire blowouts).
Be aware of cyclists and pedestrians, especially at crosswalks.
Get familiar with the car’s controls before driving in traffic.

quizzes.question: What is the correct stopping distance in wet conditions?
quizzes.answer: The correct stopping distance is double the normal distance.
quizzes.feedback: Well done! That's a key point to remember in rainy conditions.

quizzes.question: What does a red traffic light mean?
When should you use your headlights?
quizzes.answer: You should use them in low visibility conditions such as fog, rain, or at night.
quizzes.feedback: Great! Always make sure to stay visible to others.

quizzes.question: What does a yellow traffic light indicate?
quizzes.answer: It means slow down and prepare to stop if it’s safe to do so.
quizzes.feedback: Good! Make sure to be cautious at yellow lights.

quizzes.question: When can you legally use a mobile phone while driving?
quizzes.answer: Only when using a hands-free device.
quizzes.feedback: Correct! Hands-free is the way to go.

quizzes.question: What should you do if you miss your exit on the highway?
quizzes.answer: Keep driving and take the next exit, never reverse or stop.
quizzes.feedback: That's right! Never reverse on a highway.

quizzes.question: What’s the first thing you should do when your vehicle starts to skid?
quizzes.answer: Steer gently into the direction of the skid and avoid braking hard.
quizzes.feedback: Well done! Staying calm and steering gently is key.

quizzes.question: What is the speed limit in a residential area?
quizzes.answer: Typically, the speed limit is 30-40 km/h, but it can vary depending on local regulations.
quizzes.feedback: Good! Always check the posted signs in residential areas.

quizzes.question: What should you do if you approach a roundabout?
quizzes.answer: Give way to traffic already on the roundabout and always signal your exit.

quizzes.question: How do you check your blind spots?
quizzes.answer: Look over your shoulder in the direction of the lane you intend to merge into.
quizzes.feedback: Correct! Checking blind spots is crucial for safe driving.
